caption.p: The protective effect of volatile oil of Cichorium glandulosum Boiss et Huet (CG) on hepatic fibrosis in the rat model of carbon tetrachloride (CCl 4)-induced hepatic fibrosis. ( A, B) Effects of volatile oil of Cichorium glandulosum Boiss et Huet (CG) on rat liver and spleen indices. ( B–J) Effects of CG on serum aspartate transaminase (AST), alanine transaminase (ALT), albumin (Alb), malondialdehyde (MDA), lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), γ-glutamyl transpeptidase (γ-GT), hydroxyproline (Hyp), and alkaline phosphatase (ALP) activities. (n=10) (mean ±SD). Compared with the normal group, @@ p<0.01, @ p<0.05. Compared with the model group, ** p<0.01, * p<0.05.
